statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_name, location FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY user_name DESC
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(behavior_data, '$.engagement') > 0 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_demographics;
SELECT username, age, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT gender, location, interests FROM user_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, clicks, views FROM user_behavior WHERE purchases > 10 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT user_id, time_spent, last_login FROM user_behavior WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY location;
SELECT user_id, purchases FROM user_behavior WHERE purchases > 0 AND time_spent > 10 ORDER BY user_id, purchases DESC;
SELECT user_id, clicks, views, purchases FROM user_behavior ORDER BY views DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE interests LIKE '%programming%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT u.user_id, u.gender, u.location, b.behavior_type FROM user_demographics u INNER JOIN user_behavior b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING behavior_count > 5 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, action_type, timestamp FROM ad_actions WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.name, u.age, a.action_type FROM users u JOIN ad_actions a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT u.name, ud.location, a.action_type FROM users u JOIN user_demographics ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN ad_actions a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE ud.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, gender FROM users WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 100 ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, preference_category FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
